column7: Raise your hands  in the air Give them to me Raw power in your face Bringin' on the agony Can't you feel it Music knows no boundaries Bringing people to their knees Just become a part of the audience With your hands in the breeze You want to rock  you want to roll You want to live  you want to love You gotta rock  you gotta feel You gotta live  and you've got to love Can you feel it  coming out of the speakers You gotta move  you gotta shout You gotta rock  you gotta roll You gotta love  you gotta live And you've got to shout  we're gonna rock you  rock you  like a hurricane Are you ready  baby  are you ready for this Feel the storm  baby  it's a rockin' kiss Are you ready  baby  are you ready for this Feel my hand  babe  let me see you make a fist Can you feel it  coming out of the speakers You gotta move  you gotta shout You gotta rock  you gotta roll You gotta love  you gotta live And you've got to shout  we're gonna rock you  rock you  like a hurricane Let's go  come on  let's do it Let's go  come on  let's do it We're gonna rock you  rock you  like a hurricane We're gonna rock you  rock you  like a hurricane

The wise man said just walk this way To the dawn of the light The wind will blow into your face As the years pass you by Hear this voice from deep inside It's the call of your heart Close your eyes and you will find The passage out of the dark Here I am  will you send me an angel Here I am  in the land of the morning star The wise man said just find your place In the eye of the storm Seek the roses along the way Just beware of the thorns Here I am  will you send me an angel Here I am  in the land of the morning star The wise man said just raise your hand And reach out for the spell Find the door to the promised land Just believe in yourself The sehen llevahs su vitset Ihr'ree dos sofron is a-mal Don't you cry no more  no  no  no Here I am  will you send me an angel Here I am  in the land of the morning star Here I am  will you send me an angel Here I am  in the land of the morning star

Girl  it's been a long time that we've been apart Much too long for a man who needs love I miss you since I've been away Babe  it wasn't easy to leave you alone It's getting harder each time that I go If I had the choice  I would stay There's no one like you I can't wait for the nights with you I imagine the things we'll do I just wanna be loved by you No one like you I can't wait for the nights with you I imagine the things we'll do I just wanna be loved by you Girl  there are really no words strong enough To describe all my longing for love I don't want my feelings restrained Ooh  babe  I just need you like never before Just imagine you'd come through this door You'd take all my sorrow away There's no one like you I can't wait for the nights with you I imagine the things we'll do I just wanna be loved by you No one like you I can't wait for the nights with you I imagine the things we'll do I just wanna be loved by you

column3: When The Smoke Is Going Down
column7: Time  it's flowing like a river Fortune  it's smiling upon you Heal  let it heal you like a river You want to be a part of it all Love  it's hiding deep inside you And light  its shining on your way But you're just a traveller in this dreamland Waiting for another day Oh  when the smoke is going down This is the moment  oh  this is the time Oh  when the heat is going down I wanna know who's taking you home And when the night is calling I got you  oh  yeah I wanna know who's holding you tight You're living your life like a hero But you're chasing all the ghosts of your mind This is your cross  it's your passion But babe  you're the heart of all mankind Oh  when the smoke is going down This is the moment  oh  this is the time Oh  when the heat is going down I wanna know who's taking you home And when the night is calling I got you  oh  yeah I wanna know who's holding you tight Oh  when the smoke is going down This is the moment  oh  this is the time Oh  when the heat is going down I wanna know who's taking you home And when the night is calling I got you  oh  yeah I wanna know who's holding you tight.

Time  it needs time to win back your love again I will be there  I will be there Love  only love can bring back your love someday I will be there  I will be there Fight  babe  I'll fight to win back your love again I will be there  I will be there Love  only love can bring down the wall someday I will be there  I will be there If we'd go again all the way from the start I would try to change the things that killed our love Your pride has built a wall  so strong that I can't get through Is there really no chance to start once again I'm loving you  Try  baby try to trust in my love again I will be there  I will be there Love  our love just shouldn't be thrown away I will be there  I will be there If we'd go again all the way from the start I would try to change the things that killed our love Your pride has built a wall  so strong that I can't get through Is there really no chance to start once again If we'd go again all the way from the start I would try to change the things that killed our love Yes  I've hurt your pride  and I know what you've been through You should give me a chance  this can't be the end I'm still loving you  I'm still loving you  I'm still loving you

Every girl crazy 'bout a sharp dressed man  I believe it's true Well  I'm crazy 'bout a sharp dressed man  oh yeah Oh  you lookin' for some action  Some kind of love-and-passion  Something to quench my thirst  I'm not the sentimental type  I'm not gonna spend the night  Lonely and hurt Well  I ain't lookin' for an innocent girl  It's not the way that I wanna live  I'm gonna give  I'm gonna take  I'm gonna tease  I'm gonna please  I'm gonna love you tonight Some girls go 'round like they don't need anybody  They say they're feelin' hot and high  Well  I'm lookin' for someone who can love me  And keep me satisfied  I'm not the kind to lay down and die  I'm gonna give  I'm gonna take  I'm gonna tease  I'm gonna please  I'm gonna love you tonight  Well  alright Well  I'm just looking for some satisfaction  A little less talk  a little more action  Close your mouth and open up your heart  And  baby  satisfy my soul  I'm not the kind to lay down and die  I'm gonna give  I'm gonna take  I'm gonna tease  I'm gonna please  I'm gonna love you tonight Well  I ain't lookin' for no innocent girl  It's not the way that I wanna live  I'm gonna give  I'm gonna take  I'm gonna tease  I'm gonna please  I'm gonna love you tonight  Yeah  yeah  yeah  oh yeah  I'm gonna love you tonight

Dreamin' 'bout my way back home But deep inside I know I'm wrong Waitin' for my chance to show All I have to give  oh no Yeah  yeah  yeah  yeah  yeah  yeah  yeah  yeah  yeah  yeah  yeah  yeah  yeah  yeah  yeah In trance as hypnotized Like a cat I'm mesmerized I want to be alone With silent souls I wait For you there's no escape Forever to be true Forever I'll be there In trance  In trance  In trance  In trance  yeah  yeah  yeah  yeah  yeah  yeah  yeah  yeah  yeah  yeah  yeah  yeah  yeah  yeah  yeah.

Let's spend the night together I know you want it too The magic of the moment Is what I've got for you The heartbeat of this night Is made to lose control And there is something in your eyes That's longing for some more Let us find together The beat we're looking for The rhythm of love Keeps me dancing on the road The rhythm of love Got the groove that hits the bone The rhythm of love Is the game I'm looking for The rhythm of love Is the heartbeat of my soul Let's reach the top together One night will never do An exploding shot of pleasure Is what I've got for you Why don't you close your eyes And let your mind explore The possibilities that you can't ignore Be mine tonight We can make it last forever The rhythm of love Keeps me dancing on the road The rhythm of love Got the groove that hits the bone The rhythm of love Is the game I'm looking for The rhythm of love Is the heartbeat of my soul 2 Scorpions Lovedrive Lovedrive 1979 02/25/1979 So they say that love's a game A game you just can't win If there's a way I'll find it some day And then this fool will rush in Put your head on my shoulder Whisper in my ear  baby Words I want to hear Tell me  tell me that you love me too Whisper in my ear  baby Whisper in my ear  baby What you want  what you need Do you want me to love you  babe Did you ever want me to miss you Did you ever want me to care You're my everything I see your face everywhere I see your smile  your lips I smell your hair  your skin I see you when I close my eyes I can't escape and I don't want to  babe You're my everything Whisper in my ear  baby Whisper in my ear  baby What you want  what you need Do you want me to love you  babe Did you ever want me to miss you Did you ever want me to care You're my everything Whisper in my ear  baby Whisper in my ear  baby Whisper in my ear  baby What you want  what you need Do you want me to love you  babe Did you ever want me to miss you Did you ever want me to care You're my everything.

I realize I missed a day But I'm too wrecked to care anyway I look around and see this face What the hell have I lost my taste Don't want to find out Just want to cut out My head explodes  my ears ring I can't remember just where I've been The last thing that I recall I got lost in a deep black hole Don't want to find out Just want to cut out Blackout  I really had a blackout Blackout  I really had a blackout Blackout  I really had a blackout I grab my things and make my run On the way out  another one Would like to know before I stop Did I make it or did I flop Don't want to find out Just want to get out Blackout  I really had a blackout Blackout  I really had a blackout Blackout  I really had a blackout 2 Scorpions When The Smoke Is Going Down Blackout 1982 03/29/1982 Just when you make your way back home I find some time to be alone I go to see the place once more Just like a thousand nights before I climb the stage again this night 'Cause the place seems still alive When the smoke is going down This is the place where I belong I really love to turn you on I've got your sound still in my ear While your traces disappear I climb the stage again this night 'Cause the place seems still alive When the smoke is going down This is the place where I belong I really love to turn you on I've got your sound still in my ear While your traces disappear I climb the stage again this night 'Cause the place seems still alive When the smoke is going down.

Out in the fields  the fighting has begun Out on the streets  they're shooting with their guns In the darkest night  out in the pouring rain The true believers stand alone Out in the fields  the fighting has begun Out on the streets  they're shooting with their guns In the darkest night  out in the pouring rain The true believers stand alone And in the distance  out from the raging sea There is a voice that's calling  calling out to me I can hear it when I close my eyes  I can hear it reaching deep inside The good die young  that's what they say But it's hard to justify the price we pay The good die young  that's what they say We'll go on and on and on and on Out in the fields  the fighting has begun Out on the streets  they're shooting with their guns In the darkest night  out in the pouring rain The true believers stand alone And in the distance  out from the raging sea There is a voice that's calling  calling out to me I can hear it when I close my eyes  I can hear it reaching deep inside The good die young  that's what they say But it's hard to justify the price we pay The good die young  that's what they say We'll go on and on and on and on The good die young  that's what they say But it's hard to justify the price we pay The good die young  that's what they say We'll go on and on and on and on And in the distance  out from the raging sea There is a voice that's calling  calling out to me I can hear it when I close my eyes  I can hear it reaching deep inside.
